stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Emails with UTF-8 Chinese Characters in Header Use Malicious XLS Files
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 28 February 2014 a U.S company reported observing phishing emails containing malicious RTF or XLS file attachments, and UTF-8 encoded Chinese characters in the header information. The malicious files dropped an additional malware executable, a randomly named file with a .tmp extension and created mutexes beginning with the character string "example". If successfully installed, the malware attempted callback to a C2 server using a non-HTTP protocol with messages consisting of encoded 64 byte long binary data on port 448 or port 999.
Note: Port 448 is commonly used for distributed data management (DDM) over SSL.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The phishing email utilized the UTF-8 character set for simplified Chinese (PRC, Singapore), had "alumni newsletter" theme, and contained the attachment " 校友會通訊(2014).xls " (MD5 : b2d84bd297cdef679cfa9a666e66d2ab).

In-Reply-To: <1394008833.14750.YahooMailNeo@web190205.mail.sg3.yahoo.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="734958990-753362166-1394009067=:60162"
Body:
For Your Information
陳慶珉 <qmchan686@yahoo.com.hk> 於 2014年03月5日 (週三) 3:05 PM 寫道﹕
各位同學:
校友會通訊已編輯完成，請代郵寄給無電郵的同學。
陳慶珉 2014-2-26

On execution, the malicious XLS file drops and a file named with a random four character sequence and a .tmp extension, example "FC0A.tmp" (MD5 9b100b001c4a68488dc8af63f62c2d90) in the victim's temp folder.

The malware, on execution, creates the mutex "exampleex_groupdyC.?PV5k$T6ckd", and attempts to resolve one of two domains:
fordnsdynamic.no-ip.org (resolution as of 2014-03-05, IP 8.23.224.110)
www.example2.com (resolution as of 2014-03-06, IP 184.73.213.106)
If succesful in resolving to an IP the malware attempts to communicate over port 448 (or if blocked, port 999) using a 64 byte message of encoded binary.

The malware, FC0A.tmp(MD5 9b100b001c4a68488dc8af63f62c2d90), attempts to use DNS to resolve the hard-coded URL. If successful, it attempts communication with the C2 server using a non-HTTP protocol. The messages observed were 64 byte long, encoded binary on port#448.
Traffic Sample:
00000000 ee 3c 00 00 01 00 00 00 3a 00 00 00 fc 10 7f 02 .<...... :....... 00000010 b2 87 b5 62 76 57 00 fb df ce dc 70 d2 46 69 96 ...bvW.. ...p.Fi. 00000020 56 e0 30 fd 3c 7c 58 80 ce 25 a6 e8 22 a5 e3 b9 V.0.<|X. .%.."... 00000030 f3 a5 31 46 0b e6 fc ec 1a d4 5b 80 2e 62 93 3b ..1F.... ..[..b.; 00000040 25 b3 fc 76 4c f1 %..vL.

The malware, FC0A.tmp(MD5 9b100b001c4a68488dc8af63f62c2d90), attempts to use DNS to resolve the hard-coded URL. If successful, it attempts communication with the C2 server using a non-HTTP protocol. The messages observed were 64 byte long, encoded binary on port#448.
Traffic Sample:
00000000 ee 3c 00 00 01 00 00 00 3a 00 00 00 fc 10 7f 02 .<...... :....... 00000010 b2 87 b5 62 76 57 00 fb df ce dc 70 d2 46 69 96 ...bvW.. ...p.Fi. 00000020 56 e0 30 fd 3c 7c 58 80 ce 25 a6 e8 22 a5 e3 b9 V.0.<|X. .%.."... 00000030 f3 a5 31 46 0b e6 fc ec 1a d4 5b 80 2e 62 93 3b ..1F.... ..[..b.; 00000040 25 b3 fc 76 4c f1 %..vL.

Two differnt versions of a second email were observed; each contained one of the two following malicious files as attachments: Budget.xls (MD5 16a4aa88c638f7d98cfa8daa6f8d02fe) Project Work Plan.doc (MD5 229b1699b3b2165fd0f23c83fb58cecd)
Both malicious files act as a dropper for the same malicious executable, named with a random four character sequence and the .tmp extension (MD5 e36fd7fc27f38a3a53dfd183614c4186).
note: the display name for the From header was UTF-8 encoded Chinese characters (simplified, PRC, Singapore character set "华世 福")

KFP741EpkzA01yzI4knTR0x8mT_4Im00v1QGVfTrwsMzzMUJtj_1mAsnjUa_ w1DG7unF69S57S8k6WyUVXaNUvgQ_RteH.Bk2mz0n7CLGGwBYEWiyC8ylCIu 5AlAbs.Itx1E3sddKe0MGVDkbWOxeR8NGFsqQ2YIe_hkT5gxmtb2aW8wRjXD 2F6wPFt7nDPhoRxQ4bV4tSmSSlKGuiO2eCRTS_VJZn6ElQbRivugLw6Psskv opXOOKLGo3Jc- Received: from [60.27.227.50] by web75101.mail.tw1.yahoo.com via HTTP; Sat, 01 Mar 2014 11:08:07 CST X-Rocket-MIMEInfo: 002.001, RGVhcsKgYWxsLMKgCsKgClBsZWFzZcKgZmluZMKgdGhlwqB1cGRhdGVkwqB3b3JrwqBwbGFuwqBmb3LCoHlvdXLCoGluZm9ybWF0aW9uLMKgdGhhbmtzIQEwAQEBAQ-- X-Mailer: YahooMailWebService/0.8.177.636 Message-ID: <1393643287.46701.YahooMailNeo@web75101.mail.tw1.yahoo.com> Date: Sat, 1 Mar 2014 11:08:07 +0800 (CST) From: =?utf-8?B?5Y2O5LiWIOemjw==?= <fhs19780416@yahoo.com.tw> Reply-To: =?utf-8?B?5Y2O5LiWIOemjw==?= <fhs19780416@yahoo.com.tw> To: undisclosed recipients: ; MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="1584626181-1870734802-1393643287=:46701"
Body: Dear all,
Please find the updated work plan for your information, thanks!

The file "Budget.xls"(MD5 16a4aa88c638f7d98cfa8daa6f8d02fe)is an encrypted malicious Excel file that drops a randomly named (four random characters) ".tmp" file, example "21F2.tmp", which serves as the main executable (MD5 e36fd7fc27f38a3a53dfd183614c4186).

The file "Project Work Plan.doc" (MD5 229b1699b3b2165fd0f23c83fb58cecd)is a malicious RTF file that drops a randomly named (four random characters) ".tmp" file, example "21F2.tmp", which serves as the main executable (MD5 e36fd7fc27f38a3a53dfd183614c4186).

If the malware successfully installs it attempts to resolve one of the two following domains:
www.email-yahoo.org (resolution as of 2014-02-28 IP 221.144.80.156) www.webkimit.org (resolution as of 2014-02-28 IP 221.144.80.156)
The malware then attempts to communicate with a 64 byte string of encoded binary on port 448.

The malware, 21F2.tmp (MD5 E936CDF86E207173E4BB477F23A8DE2D,attempts to use DNS to resolve the hard-coded URL. If successful, it attempts communication with the C2 server using a non-HTTP protocol. The messages observed were 64 byte long, encoded binary on port#448.
Traffic Sample:
00000000 0d 28 00 00 01 00 00 00 2f 00 00 00 fc 10 7f 02 .(...... /....... 00000010 b2 87 b5 62 76 57 00 84 3f 97 e1 a3 3c 54 14 49 ...bvW.. ?...<T.I 00000020 e7 79 06 7b f2 92 c9 d0 3a 41 45 d8 35 7b 42 dd .y.{.... :AE.5{B. 00000030 ec 6f 27 f0 3a e0 47 65 f2 70 f8 .o'.:.Ge .p.
Whois:
Three domains are registered using the same email (2493852060@qq.com) and hosted on the same server (IP 221.144.80.156) as of 28 February 2014:
1. email-yahoo.org 2. webkimit.org 3. zgqipai.net
Domain registration information as of 2014-03-06:
Domain Name:EMAIL-YAHOO.ORG Domain ID: D170508985-LROR Creation Date: 2013-12-24T08:38:05Z Updated Date: 2014-02-23T03:45:34Z Registry Expiry Date: 2014-12-24T08:38:05Z Sponsoring Registrar:Hichina Zhicheng Technology Limited (R1373-LROR) Sponsoring Registrar IANA ID: 420 WHOIS Server: Referral URL: Domain Status: ok Registrant ID:HC-511422276-CN Registrant Name:zhixin wang Registrant Organization:g m t Registrant Street: east bao shan street 21 hao Registrant City:xinzhu Registrant State/Province:TW Registrant Postal Code:000745 Registrant Country:CN Registrant Phone:+86.042366497812 Registrant Phone Ext: Registrant Fax: +86.02164209578 Registrant Fax Ext: Registrant Email:

The malware, 21F2.tmp (MD5 E936CDF86E207173E4BB477F23A8DE2D, attempts to use DNS to resolve the hard-coded URL. If successful, it attempts communication with the C2 server using a non-HTTP protocol. The messages observed were 64 byte long, encoded binary on port#448.
Traffic Sample:
00000000 0d 28 00 00 01 00 00 00 2f 00 00 00 fc 10 7f 02 .(...... /....... 00000010 b2 87 b5 62 76 57 00 84 3f 97 e1 a3 3c 54 14 49 ...bvW.. ?...<T.I 00000020 e7 79 06 7b f2 92 c9 d0 3a 41 45 d8 35 7b 42 dd .y.{.... :AE.5{B. 00000030 ec 6f 27 f0 3a e0 47 65 f2 70 f8 .o'.:.Ge .p.
00000000 ee 3c 00 00 01 00 00 00 3a 00 00 00 fc 10 7f 02 .<...... :....... 00000010 b2 87 b5 62 76 57 00 fb df ce dc 70 d2 46 69 96 ...bvW.. ...p.Fi. 00000020 56 e0 30 fd 3c 7c 58 80 ce 25 a6 e8 22 a5 e3 b9 V.0.<|X. .%.."... 00000030 f3 a5 31 46 0b e6 fc ec 1a d4 5b 80 2e 62 93 3b ..1F.... ..[..b.; 00000040 25 b3 fc 76 4c f1
Whois:

1. email-yahoo.org 2. webkimit.org 3. zgqipai.net
Domain Name:WEBKIMIT.ORG Domain ID: D170482878-LROR Creation Date: 2013-12-20T09:07:27Z Updated Date: 2014-02-19T03:45:35Z Registry Expiry Date: 2014-12-20T09:07:27Z Sponsoring Registrar:Hichina Zhicheng Technology Limited (R1373-LROR) Sponsoring Registrar IANA ID: 420 WHOIS Server: Referral URL: Domain Status: ok Registrant ID:HC-690897330-CN Registrant Name:xiangru li Registrant Organization:bayer ag Registrant Street: zhongzheng chongqing SouthRoad 1-83 Registrant City:taibei Registrant State/Province:TW Registrant Postal Code:10008 Registrant Country:CN Registrant Phone:+86.02164209578 Registrant Phone Ext: Registrant Fax: +86.02164209578 Registrant Fax Ext: Registrant Email:2493852060@qq.com

The domain zgqipai.net is a likely additional C2 domain, however it was not reported as an observed callback by the submitting organization.
